official-title.#text: To require a 50 percent reduction in the number of limousines in the Federal fleet.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

header.#text: Reduction in limousines in Federal fleet

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, for fiscal
			 year 2015 and each fiscal year thereafter, the number of limousines in the
			 Federal fleet shall not exceed 50 percent of the number of limousines in
			 the Federal fleet as of the last day of fiscal year 2014.

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law and except as provided in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not apply with respect to any limousine determined by the

to be
			 essential for reasons of national security.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4331 IH: To require a 50 percent reduction in the number of limousines in the Federal fleet.
